name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Front End Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications, specializing in **JavaScript**, **React**, **Vue.js**, **Angular**, **CSS**, and **Tailwind CSS**. Expertise in implementing **CI/CD** pipelines and developing **REST APIs** to enhance system reliability and efficiency. Proven ability to integrate **AI tools** for automation and improving user experience. Skilled in using design tools like **Figma**, **Sketch**, **Storybook**, and testing frameworks such as **Playwright**, **Cypress**, and **Jest** to ensure robust front-end development. 
Demonstrated success in problem-solving and collaboration, fostering clear communication among cross-functional teams. Strong background in designing and deploying applications within compliance-driven environments, making significant contributions to the healthcare and financial industries by aligning with standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS.
